Data 102: Data, Inference, and Decisions

UC Berkeley, Fall 2023

Aditya Guntuboyina

aditya@stat.berkeley.edu

Ramesh Sridharan

ramesh_s@berkeley.edu

Week 1

Aug 23
  • Welcome to Data 102! The first lecture will be on Thursday, August 24th, from 3:30PM - 5PM in Li Ka Shing 245.
  • Please carefully read through the course policies, which covers the details of the course this fall.
